short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover and activate B2B creators. Access highly-engaged audiences at scale. Prove ROI through real-time analytics.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Track your LinkedIn post analytics and easily share them with your brand partners in Limelight.

• Track specific posts in your feed with one click
• Share post analytics with your brand partners
• Brands get detailed, actionable analytics without you needing to screenshot over and over

Simply install the Chrome Extension and follow the instructions in your dashboard at app.limelighthq.com/analytics

** This Chrome extension DOES NOT store or send any of your account credentials, including cookies, emails, or passwords. **
